page.title: 05Recreation
page.content: There is not much in Crossens except church and chapel activities such as Boys and Girls Brigade,Scouts,Guides,Cubs and Brownies.The church and chapel also have groups for adults.Some children play on the recreation ground.There used to be a library on Crossens Rec. but the council closed it to save money.It is a pity because the childrens section was very popular.Now our nearest library is in Churchtown two miles away.Not many children bother to go.Sometimes the mobile library comes.There are two football/ cricket pitches_the Rec. and New Lane.Some boys from Crossens school are in the cricket teams.There is also a bowling green.A Riding school has opened down New Lane.
